description: From Arabic اَلْمَجِسْطِيّ‎ (al-majisṭiyy, “almagest”), with اَل‎ (al-) being the Arabic definite article, from Middle Persian 𐭬𐭢𐭮𐭲𐭩𐭪‎ (mgstyk /magestīg/)[[Category:|ALMAGEST]], from Ancient Greek μεγίστη (megístē, “greatest”).

entries.meaning: A comprehensive treatise on astronomy, alchemy, geography and/or mathematics (originally compiled by Ptolemy circa 150 C.E.).
